articles.author: MOGOMOTSI MAGOME Associated Press
articles.title: Child among 10 family members killed in S. Africa shooting - ABC News
articles.description: Police say 10 members of the same family were killed in a mass shooting at a house in South Africa
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG -- Ten members of the same family, seven of them female and one a 13-year-old boy, were killed in a mass shooting at a house in South Africa, police said Friday.
A male suspect was kill… [+2056 chars]

articles.author: Brendan Rascius
articles.title: Creature thought ‘extinct’ in African park spotted for first time in decades. See it - Miami Herald
articles.description: ‘Extinct’ big cat spotted on remote camera in Sena Oura National Park in Africa for the first time in two decades, officials said.
articles.content:
Lions were considered extinct in an African national park and had not been spotted for two decades. 
But recently, a healthy lioness was captured on a remote camera in the park, delighting conservat… [+2391 chars]

articles.title: More African countries set to approve malaria shot; 20 million doses ready in 2023 | Africanews - Africanews English
articles.description: African countries that do not have extensive resources for drug regulation have previously relied on the U.N. agency to initially review new medicines.
articles.content:
African countries are lining up to approve a new vaccine for malaria, with 20 million doses available for them to buy this year, the shots manufacturer told Reuters.
